statements: DELETE FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE machine_id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE sensor_reading > 50 AND machine_id = 2;
DELETE FROM predictive_maintenance_data WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND value > 50.0;
DELETE FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND task_description LIKE '%replace%'
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND timestamp >= '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM maintenance_logs WHERE event_id IN (SELECT event_id FROM maintenance_events WHERE event_type = 'Repair');
